name: Gregory HINES, Petitioner v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of Department of Corrections, Christopher M. Thomas, Director CMR-Philadelphia Prison System, et al., Respondents

parties: Gregory HINES, Petitioner v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of Department of Corrections, Christopher M. Thomas, Director CMR-Philadelphia Prison System, et al., Respondents.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 11th day of February, 2013, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the “Suggestion of Mootness” are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
61 A.3d 195
Gregory HINES, Petitioner v. John E. WETZEL, Secretary of Department of Corrections, Christopher M. Thomas, Director CMR-Philadelphia Prison System, et al., Respondents.
No. 212 EM 2012.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Feb. 11, 2013.
